card.name: Abeyance
card.property: Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities. Draw a card.

card.name: Alabaster Dragon
card.property: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Alms
card.property: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Angelic Renewal
card.property: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

card.name: Ardent Militia
card.property: Vigilance

card.name: Argivian Find
card.property: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aura of Silence
card.property: Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Benalish Infantry
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Benalish Knight
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Benalish Missionary
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.

card.name: Debt of Loyalty
card.property: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.

card.property: Flying, protection from black

card.name: Empyrial Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Foriysian Brigade
card.property: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
card.property: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Guided Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Heavy Ballista
card.property: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Inner Sanctum
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

card.name: Kithkin Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater. Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to enchanted creature this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Master of Arms
card.property: First strike {1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.

card.name: Mistmoon Griffin
card.property: Flying When Mistmoon Griffin dies, exile Mistmoon Griffin, then return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Peacekeeper
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}. Creatures can't attack.

card.name: Revered Unicorn
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Revered Unicorn leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Serenity
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Serra's Blessing
card.property: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

card.name: Soul Shepherd
card.property: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Southern Paladin
card.property: {W} {W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Tariff
card.property: Each player sacrifices the creature they control with the highest mana value unless they pay that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest, that player chooses one.

card.name: Volunteer Reserves
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Abduction
card.property: Enchant creature When Abduction enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature. You control enchanted creature. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Abjure
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a blue permanent. Counter target spell.

card.name: Ancestral Knowledge
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Ancestral Knowledge enters the battlefield, look at the top ten cards of your library, then exile any number of them and put the rest back on top of your library in any order. When Ancestral Knowledge leaves the battlefield, shuffle your library.

card.name: Apathy
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random. If the player does, untap that creature.

card.name: Argivian Restoration
card.property: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Avizoa
card.property: Flying {0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Cloud Djinn
card.property: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Disrupt
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

card.name: Ertai's Familiar
card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves the battlefield, mill three cards. {U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.

card.name: Flux
card.property: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

card.name: Fog Elemental
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Mana Chains
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Manta Ray
card.property: Manta Ray can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Manta Ray can't be blocked except by blue creatures. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Manta Ray.

card.name: Merfolk Traders
card.property: When Merfolk Traders enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Noble Benefactor
card.property: When Noble Benefactor dies, each player may search their library for a card and put that card into their hand. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles.

card.name: Ophidian
card.property: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Paradigm Shift
card.property: Exile all cards from your library. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Pendrell Mists

card.property: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

card.name: Relearn
card.property: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sage Owl

card.name: Teferi's Veil

When a player doesn't pay Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep, Heart of Bogardan deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus 2.
